issue.title: Implement multi-phase feature
issue.body:
## Description

We need to implement a complex feature that requires multiple phases.

## Requirements

- Design and planning
- Core implementation
- Testing and documentation

## Approach

Break down into phases for manageability.

subIssues.title: [Phase 1]: Design and planning
subIssues.body:
## Description

Design the architecture and create a plan.

## Todo

- [x] Create architecture diagram
- [x] Define interfaces

subIssues.title: [Phase 2]: Core implementation
subIssues.body:
## Description

Implement the core functionality.

## Todo

- [ ] Implement main logic
- [ ] Add error handling

subIssues.title: [Phase 3]: Testing and documentation
subIssues.body:
## Description

Add tests and documentation.

## Affected Areas

- `src/core/feature.test.ts` (create) - Unit tests
- `docs/README.md` (modify) - Update documentation

## Todo

- [ ] Write unit tests
- [ ] Write integration tests
- [ ] Update documentation

subIssues.title: [Phase 2]: Core implementation
subIssues.body:
## Description

Implement the core functionality.

## Affected Areas

- `src/core/feature.ts` (create) - Main feature implementation

## Todo

- [ ] Implement main logic
- [ ] Add error handling
